statements: SELECT * FROM premium_payments LIMIT 5;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM premium_payments WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_number, payment_amount FROM premium_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM premium_payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, policy_number, payment_date FROM premium_payments WHERE policy_number LIKE 'P%';
SELECT * FROM premium_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT payment_id, policy_number, payment_amount FROM premium_payments WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY payment_amount ASC
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM premium_payments WHERE policy_number LIKE '%A%'
SELECT * FROM premium_payments WHERE policy_number IN ('P001', 'P002', 'P003')
SELECT AVG(payment_amount) AS avg_payment_amount, MAX(payment_amount) AS max_payment_amount FROM premium_payments
SELECT * FROM premiums;
SELECT policy_number, premium_amount FROM premiums WHERE payment_date = '2022-05-15';
SELECT policy_number, renewal_date FROM policy_renewals ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT policy_number, premium_amount FROM premiums WHERE premium_amount > 500;
SELECT * FROM premiums JOIN policy_renewals ON premiums.policy_number = policy_renewals.policy_number;
SELECT * FROM premiums WHERE premium_amount > 1000
SELECT policy_number, premium_amount FROM premiums WHERE payment_date > '2021-06-01'
SELECT * FROM policy_renewals WHERE renewal_amount < 500 AND renewal_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT policy_number, payment_date FROM premiums WHERE premium_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT * FROM premiums JOIN policy_renewals ON premiums.policy_number = policy_renewals.policy_number
SELECT * FROM PremiumPayments ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT policy_id, payment_amount FROM PremiumPayments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder, policy_type FROM Policies WHERE policy_type = 'health' ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM PolicyRenewals WHERE renewal_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT policy_id, renewal_amount, renewed_by FROM PolicyRenewals WHERE renewal_amount <= 500;
SELECT * FROM PremiumPayments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT policy_holder, policy_type, policy_amount FROM Policies WHERE policy_amount < 5000 ORDER BY policy_holder ASC;
SELECT policy_id, renewal_date, renewal_amount FROM PolicyRenewals WHERE renewal_amount BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000 ORDER BY renewal_id ASC;
SELECT policy_id, payment_date, payment_amount FROM PremiumPayments WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Policies WHERE policy_end_date < '2023-01-01' AND policy_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Policies
SELECT id, policy_number, policy_holder FROM Policies
SELECT policy_holder, policy_number FROM Policies
SELECT policy_holder, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM Policies
SELECT id, policy_number, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM Policies
SELECT * FROM Policies ORDER BY policy_number ASC;
SELECT policy_holder, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM Policies WHERE policy_holder LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY policy_start_date DESC;

SELECT p.policy_number, p.policy_holder, pr.renewal_date, pr.premium_amount FROM Policies p JOIN PolicyRenewals pr ON p.id = pr.policy_id WHERE pr.renewal_type = 'Annual' ORDER BY pr.renewal_date ASC;
SELECT pp.payment_date, pp.amount, pt.type_name FROM PremiumPayments pp JOIN Policies p ON pp.policy_id = p.id JOIN PolicyTypes pt ON p.id = pt.id ORDER BY pp.payment_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT pr.renewal_type, COUNT(pr.id) AS total_renewals FROM PolicyRenewals pr GROUP BY pr.renewal_type HAVING total_renewals > 1 ORDER BY total_renewals DESC;
SELECT * FROM premium_payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_holder_email FROM policy_holders WHERE policy_holder_phone = '123456789';
SELECT renewal_id, renewal_date, renewal_amount FROM policy_renewals ORDER BY renewal_amount ASC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM policy_details WHERE policy_type = 'Health';
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM policy_claims ORDER BY claim_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM premium_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_holder_email FROM policy_holders WHERE policy_holder_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT policy_type, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM policy_details WHERE policy_start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND policy_end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT policy_id, renewal_date, renewal_amount FROM policy_renewals WHERE renewal_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY renewal_date ASC;
SELECT policy_holder_name, payment_amount FROM premium_payments JOIN policy_holders ON premium_payments.policy_id = policy_holders.policy_id WHERE payment_amount < 5000;
